original: Ericsson, John August, statsråd, Kinna, f. 6/4/07 i Kinna, Älvsb. 1., av Johan E. o. Alma Johansson. G. 28 m. Anna Karlström. Barn: Britt-Inga-Lill f. 28, Aina Chriistina 46. — Korresp :kurser i nat:ekonomi, nä-ringsgeogr. m. fl. ämnen. Avd:chef 1 statens arb :markn :komm. 43, konsult. statsråd sed. 45. Fd. led. av komm:fullm. o. komm:nd i Kinna, fd. led. av munic :fullm., fd. ordf. i mu-nic :ndn, fd. led. av fattigv :styr., fd. insp. f. Kinna komm. yrkessk., fd. led. av egnah:ndn o. av KF förvaltn :råd, led. av riksd. andra kamm. sed. 37, led. av 38 års arb :skyddskomm., 41 års fam :beskattn :sakk., försv:bered-sk. avveckl :komm. nr 1 o. av komm. f. ekon. efterkrigsplanering, led. av soc:dem. partistyr. sed. 44, ordf. i Älvsb. s. soc:dem. partidistr. sed. 39, led. av styr. f. Sjuhäradsbygdens Tryckeri A-B i Borås. Carnegiehjäl-te 42.
translated: Ericsson, John August, cabinet minister, Kinna, born April 6, 1907 in Kinna, Älvsborg County, son of Johan E. and Alma Johansson. Married Anna Karlström in 1928. Children: Britt-Inga-Lill born in 1928, Aina Chriistina born in 1946. Corresponded in courses in natural economics, economic geography, and other subjects. Department head of the State Labor Market Commission in 1943, consultant to cabinet ministers since 1945. Former member of the municipal council and the municipal board in Kinna, former chairman of the municipal board, former member of the poor relief board, former inspector for Kinna Municipal Vocational School, former member of the local council and of the KF Administration Council, member of the Second Chamber of the Swedish Parliament since 1937, member of the 1938 Labor Protection Committee, 1941 Family Taxation Committee, 1942 Defense Preparedness Dismissal Committee No. 1 and the Economic Post-War Planning Committee, member of the Social Democratic Party since 1944, chairman of the Älvsborg County Social Democratic Party District since 1939, member of the board of Sjuhäradsbygdens Tryckeri A-B in Borås. Carnegie Hero Medal recipient in 1942.

occupation.name: Department Head of the State Labor Market Commission
